captions.text:
>>WELCOME TO TONIGHT'S EPISODE OF
MURDER MYSTERY MANSION

OF MURDER.
LET'S SET THE STAGE.

NINE FRIENDS GATHER FOR A FORMAL DINNER PARTY,
BUT ONLY ONE OF THEM LEAVES ALIVE.

ARE YOU CLEVER ENOUGH TO CATCH THE CUNNING
CULPRIT?

OR WILL YOU BE DELICIOUSLY DECEIVED?
ALLITERATION IS AWESOME.

>>WELCOME EVERYONE.
AND PREPARE YOURSELVES FOR A WONDERFUL EVENING.

>>HM TOO BAD THIS WEATHER IS DREADFUL.
>>YES, BUT WE SHOULDN'T ALLOW

THAT TO SPOIL OUR FUN.
[GASPS] >>WHAT HAPPENED TO THE LIGHTS?

>>DON'T WORRY, THEY WILL COME
BACK ON SHORTLY.

THIS HAPPENS EVERY TIME
LIGHTNING STRIKES NEARBY.

SEE?
THERE WE ARE.

>>WAIT, SO YOU'RE SAYING THAT THE LIGHTS
ALWAYS GO OFF

WHENEVER LIGHTNING STRIKES.
>>YES.

>>INTERESTING.
>>H'ORDEUVRES ANYONE?

>>OH MY.
THESE LOOK DELICIOUS!

>>YAH!
[GASP] >>THE PROFESSOR.

WHO COULD HAVE DONE THIS?
THE BUTLER.

>>ARE YOU SERIOUS?
WE SAW YOU STAB HIM.

>>IMPOSSIBLE.
IT WAS DARK.

>>YOU KILLED HIM BEFORE IT WENT DARK.
PLUS YOU ARE HOLDING THE WEAPON.

>>THIS IS THE BUTLER'S.
>>IT LITERALLY HAS YOUR NAME ON IT.

WITH THE INSCRIPTION, "HAPPY TENTH BIRTHDAY,
LOVE GRANDPA."

>>WELL-PLAYED BUTLER.
WELL PLAYED.

YOU THOUGHT OF EVERYTHING.
>>DO YOU HONESTLY EXPECT-- [GUNSHOT]

[SCREAM] >>OH!
GUNSHOT!

NOW WE KNOW IT'S THE BUTLER.
>>WE STILL SAW YOU.

>>YOU SEEM TO BE UNABLE TO GRASP THE CONCEPT
OF WAITING UNTIL IT'S DARK BEFORE YOU KILL.

>>AHA!
HE HAS THE WEAPON!

>>OKAY, BUT I'M CALLING THE POLICE.
>>WAIT, NO.

I CAN EXPLAIN EVERYTHING!
IF YOU-- >>AHA!

NO!
[SCREAM] >>SO CLOSE.

AHA!
I KNOW HOW THIS LOOKS, BUT I AM TELLING YOU,

IT'S THE BUTLER.
>>HOW CAN YOU POSSIBLY EXPECT US TO BELIEVE YOU?
>>OH.

>>OH NO!
[GASPS] >>CUTE.

>>LET ME GUESS, IT WAS THE BUTLER.
>>YES.

>>NO MORE OF THIS ON MY ROO-- >>AND SO WE
LEAVE YOU.

TUNE IN NEXT WEEK FOR THE EXCITING CONCLUSION
TO THIS BAFFLING MYSTERY.

WAS IT THE BUTLER?
THE FAIR LADY?
OR PERHAPS THAT MAN.
OW.

title: Blame It On the Butler - Studio C
